ygData.subject: 9th Level!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I hit level 9 last night and ran like the clappers to Grobb to buy all my spells.  There awful cheap when you think we have to level 9 to start casting them!!!
ygData.messageBody:
I hit level 9 last night and ran like the clappers to Grobb to buy all my
spells. There awful cheap when you think we have to level 9 to start
casting them!!! I bought them all and was practicing them on some poor
helpless Froglok Tads near the bashers!!!

Plus I got to help some brand new characters against multiple Kobold's
ganging up on then, since I was in the area!

I have a couple of question for you experts out there?

1 - Does that drain strength spell only work the once on you, ie It does or
doesn't stack???

2 - How does the Attack delay work on weapons??? I have both the Bone
Claymore and then Big axe from Lynuga, I've been using the Axe but I'm not
sure which is better?

Spells are great especially Summon Skelly, it's actually nice to have
somebody to walk around with, since I solo most of the time. I never seem
to have players on-line at my level!! Oh well!

Oh yea, I'm on the Quellious Server, which had it's First Birthday
Yesterday, so any of you out there fancy playing a Troll Shadow Knight on a
new server come join me and build up quick, then we could start our own
exclusive Guild!!!!


James(Goraknor the Troll)
